name: indoor
description:
You got 2 games in 1. Indoor and a concept "Lovely Piano".

You will need these when you finish the game:

The codes for the piano...(exit, mainmenu, levelone, leveltwo, levelthree)

Little Description and Presentation:

A little 2d game made in 2 months(my first game),  using Unity and for textures Adobe AE. You got three levels to complete in order to finish my little game, everything made from 0.  A little secret at the end of the game, a concept i had for a while to extend the time of playing. Tried to make it as creative as possible.  The game doesn't have the basic elements like options or save system in order to play the game one time.

Controls:

Only "A" and "D" and "Space" for jumping, nothing special.

Theme:

I went from the start with the idea of a very simple game about a cube, but i extended "the box" and started to add different elements.

My Youtube Channel: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQqYa3bczpqZsaNw4Jcu0Xg
